files.help:
Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export BINDLEPATH="$XDG_DATA_HOME/bindle"
```

Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export BINDLERC="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/bindlerc"
```

Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export BINDLERC="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/dotsrc"
```
